scarlet.name: Scarlet
scarlet.pasive:
If a card used immediately before was from the assigned combatant, +15% attack card damage. Stacks up to 2 times and is removed if another combatant's card is used.
When the assigned combatant uses 2 or more cards, they gain [Focus].
[Focus]: Attack card damage of the assigned combatant is increased by 20%
Remove Focus when another combatant's card is used.
scarlet.Ego:
250% Damage
+10% Designated Combatants's Attack Card Damage Amount for each owned buff (0) for1 turn
scarlet.max_pasive:
If a card used immediately before was from the assigned combatant, +30% attack card damage. Stacks up to 2 times and is removed if another combatant's card is used.
When the assigned combatant uses 2 or more cards, they gain [Focus].
[Focus]: Attack card damage of the assigned combatant is increased by 40%
Remove Focus when another combatant's card is used.

asteria.name: Asteria
asteria.pasive:
The assigned combatant's attack cards with a cost of 2 or more deal +25% damage.
Increase Damage Amount of Pulverize cards of the assigned Combatant by 10%.
asteria.Ego: +20% Damage of the next Attack card used by  Designated Combatants based on the total cost of all cards in hand (0) (Max 10)
asteria.max_pasive:
The assigned combatant's attack cards with a cost of 2 or more deal +50% damage.
Increase Damage Amount of Pulverize cards of the assigned Combatant by 20%.

ritochka.name: Ritochka
ritochka.pasive:
The assigned Combatant's attack cards with a cost of 2 or more deal +10% damage.
At the start of the turn, 1 of the assigned Combatant’s attack cards gains +5% damage for every point of the total cost of attack cards.
ritochka.max_pasive:
The assigned combatant's attack cards with a cost of 2 or more deal +20% damage.
At the start of the turn, 1 of the assigned combatant’s attack cards gains +10% damage for every point of the total cost of attack cards.

douglas.name: Douglas
douglas.pasive:
The assigned combatant’s Attack is increased by 8%.
At the start of battle, Damage dealt by the assigned combatant increases by 8% for 1 turn.
douglas.max_pasive:
The assigned combatant’s Attack is increased by 16%.
At the start of battle, Damage dealt by the assigned combatant increases by 16% for 1 turn.

zeta.name: Zeta
zeta.pasive:
The Defense-Based Damage of the assigned combatant’s Instinct cards is increased by 15%.
The assigned Combatant's Defense-Based Damage and Shield Amount for the Celestial card becomes +25%
zeta.max_pasive:
The Defense-Based Damage of the assigned combatant’s Instinct cards is increased by 30%.
The assigned Combatant's Defense-Based Damage and Shield Amount for the Celestial card becomes +50%

wilhelmina.name: Wilhelmina
wilhelmina.pasive:
The assigned combatant’s Defense is increased by 12%.
When the assigned combatant targets a Vulnerable enemy, +10% Defense-based Damage of Attack cards.
wilhelmina.max_pasive:
The assigned combatant’s Defense is increased by 24%.
When the assigned combatant targets a Vulnerable enemy, +20% Defense-based Damage of Attack cards.

rachel.name: Rachel
rachel.pasive:
The assigned combatant's skill card shield gain is increased by 10%.
When the assigned combatant gains Shield, 20% chance to gain 1 Counterattack.
rachel.max_pasive:
The assigned combatant's skill card shield gain is increased by 20%.
When the assigned combatant gains Shield, 40% chance to gain 1 Counterattack.

itsuku.name: Itsuku
itsuku.pasive:
The assigned combatant’s Attack is increased by 8%.
Every time the assigned Combatant’s cards stack, increases Damage Amount of Attack Cards by 5%. Can stack up to 3 times.
Every time 1 Attack Card used by the assigned Combatant deals 3 Hits, inflicts 30% Fixed Damage to the target.
itsuku.Ego:
200% Damage to all enemies
1 Fierce Winds

nyx.name: Nyx
nyx.pasive:
The assigned combatant's HP and healing are increased by 8%.
When the assigned combatant Draws for the first time each turn using an ability, +8% Damage dealt by allies for 1 turn.
nyx.Ego:
Discard up to 3 cards,
then Draw +1 cards equal to the number discarded

arwen.name: Arwen
arwen.pasive:
The assigned combatant's HP and healing are increased by 8%.
At the start of the turn, gain [Ponopoko’s Cheer] equal to the number of enemies with attack intentions.
[Ponopoko’s Cheer]: Incoming Damage is reduced by 10%
Upon activation, remove Ponopoko’s Cheer#1 (stacks up to 3 times)

yvonne.name: Yvonne
yvonne.pasive:
The assigned combatant’s Defense is increased by 8%.
When the assigned Combatant does not use an Attack Card by the end of the turn, recover Health by Healing 30% at the start of the next turn.

zatera.name: Zatera
zatera.pasive:
The assigned combatant’s Attack is increased by 8%.
When Injured, at the end of battle, recover 4% Health..

eloise.name: Eloise
eloise.pasive:
The combatant's attack card damage increases by 10%.
The first time the assigned Combatant either Exhausts a card or gains a Status Ailment card (includes cards that have been changed from Status Ailment cards), increases Damage Amount of Attack Cards by 12% for 1 turn.
eloise.Ego: For 1 turn, when a card is Exhausted, 1 Weaken to a random enemy

marin.name: Marin
marin.pasive:
The Extra Attack damage of cards generated by the assigned combatant's abilities increases by 15%.
When a Skill Card is used for the first time by the assigned Combatant each turn, +25% Damage Amount to Extra Attacks for 1 turn.
marin.Ego:
200% Damage to all enemies
Draw 1 skill card(s)

rosaria.name: Rosaria
rosaria.pasive:
The assigned combatant's Extra Attack damage is increased by 10%.
When the assigned Combatant uses an Upgrade or Skill Card, 25% chance to gain 1 Morale for 1 turn.
rosaria.Ego:
Draw 1 Upgrade Card(s)
If there are no Upgrade Cards in Draw Pile, Draw 1

peko.name: Peko
peko.pasive:
Increase the assigned Combatant’s Attack by 8%.
When the assigned Combatant’s card Moves from Graveyard to hand, gain 1 Repairs Complete.
Repairs Complete#1: +10% Damage Amount to the assigned Combatant’s Attack Cards (max 3 stacks)
Increase Damage Amount of the assigned Combatant’s Attack Cards that are used against Ravaged targets by 15%.
peko.Ego:
When an ally inflicts Ravage, 1 Overclock to Designated Combatants (1 time per turn)
Overclok: +25% chitical chance for 1 turn

serithea.name: Serithea
serithea.pasive:
The Critical Chance of the combatant’s attack cards increases by 8%.
When the assigned combatant's attack results in a Critical Hit, +3% Critical Damage. Stacks up to 5 times.

yuri.name: Yuri
yuri.pasive:
The assigned combatant’s Attack is increased by 8%.
Upon the first shuffle, the assigned combatant’s damage dealt is increased by 8%.

alyssa.name: Alyssa
alyssa.pasive:
The assigned combatant’s Defense is increased by 12%.
At the end of battle, Recover 3% Health.
alyssa.Ego:
Heal 100%
1 Morale for 1 turn
Increase Heal Amount by 50% when below 30% HP

gaya.name: Gaya
gaya.pasive:
Increase the assigned Combatant’s Defense by 8%.
+20% Defense-Based Damage Amount to the assigned Combatant’s Instinct cards.
When using a Unique Attack Card of the assigned Combatant with an original Cost of 6, +20% to Damage Amount of all allies (max 1 stack).
